item.title: Problems with locales?
item.description:
Reviewing photos from my trip to Punta Cana, I found this one taken at Punta Cana's airport:


Looks like they had some problems with locales! The text should have read EspaÃ±a (or Spain).

On a related note, it was also curious to see all other monitors mention the flight's destination city whereas ours showed the whole country. According to the other screens, it should have really said Madrid.
